mapper.select: select * from mileage where usercode= #{usercode} order by m_day desc
select * from mileage where usercode= #{usercode} and m_content = '마일리지 출금' order by m_day desc
SELECT * FROM mileage WHERE usercode= #{usercode} and m_day = (SELECT MAX(m_day)AS m_day FROM mileage)
mapper.update: update USER_DETAIL set mileage=#{m_total} where usercode=#{usercode}
mapper.select: select * from job where usercode=#{usercode} order by j_Registration desc
select * from jobsearch where usercode=#{usercode} order by js_registration desc
select a.name j_info, j.job job from (select USERCODE, name from users u, jobcheck ch where ch.JK_USERCODE = u.USERCODE and ch.JOBSEARCHCODE=#{JOBSEARCHCODE}) a, job j where a.USERCODE = j.USERCODE

select b.pd_name pd_name, b.de_date de_date, b.de_cnt de_cnt, b.name name, b.phone phone, ud.USER_HOME USER_HOME, b.prod_code prod_code from (select a.pd_name , a.de_date , a.de_cnt , name, phone, usercode, a.prod_code prod_code from(select pd_name, de_date, de_cnt, de_usercode, p.prod_code prod_code from product p, deal d where p.prod_code = d.prod_code and usercode=#{usercode})a, users u where a.de_usercode= u.USERCODE)b, user_detail ud where b.usercode = ud.usercode

select pd_d.de_date de_date, pd_d.de_cnt de_cnt, pd_d.pd_name pd_name, pd_d.prod_code prod_code, u.name name, u.phone phone from (select d.de_date de_date, d.de_cnt de_cnt, pd.pd_name pd_name, pd.usercode usercode, d.prod_code prod_code from deal d, product pd where d.prod_code=pd.prod_code and de_usercode=#{usercode})pd_d, users u where pd_d.usercode=u.usercode

select a.au_name au_name, a.ctprice ctprice, a.fin_time fin_time, a.state state, a.auctioncode auctioncode, a.name name, a.phone phone, ude.user_home user_home from (select auc.au_name au_name, auc.ctprice ctprice, auc.fin_time fin_time, auc.state state, auc.auctioncode auctioncode, auc.fin_name fin_name, u.name name, u.phone phone from auction auc, users u where auc.fin_name = u.usercode(+) and auc.usercode=#{usercode})a, user_detail ude where a.fin_name = ude.usercode(+) order by state asc ,auctioncode desc

SELECT auc.au_name au_name, auc.ctprice ctprice, auc.fin_time fin_time, auc.state state, auc.auctioncode auctioncode FROM (SELECT AUTIONCODE, max(BR_DATE) FROM (select * from au_recipe where br_user=#{usercode}) GROUP by AUTIONCODE)a, auction auc where a.autioncode=auc.auctioncode order by state, auctioncode desc

select d.docode docode, d.do_product do_product, d.do_cnt do_cnt, (select count(DO_NAME) from do_condition doc where d.docode=doc.docode(+) and doc.state=0) app_cnt from donation d where d.usercode=#{usercode} order by do_cnt desc, docode desc

select (select mileage from USER_DETAIL where usercode = #{usercode}) mileage ,(select count(jk_usercode) from jobcheck where jobsearchcode = (select jobsearchcode from jobsearch where usercode = #{usercode})) jk_cnt ,(select count(de_code) from deal where prod_code in(select prod_code from product where usercode = #{usercode})) prod_cnt ,(select count(auctioncode) from auction where usercode = #{usercode} and state =0) auction_cnt from dual

select m_total, m_day from mileage where m_day in ( SELECT max(m_day) FROM mileage where usercode = #{usercode} and m_day BETWEEN sysdate-30 and sysdate GROUP BY rollup (to_char(m_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) )
select boardcode, b_title, b_day,B_CATEGORY from board where usercode = #{usercode} order by b_day desc , boardcode desc
mapper.update: update USER_DETAIL set bank = #{bank}, account = #{account}, user_home = #{user_home} where usercode=#{usercode}
update users set userlvl = -1 where usercode = #{usercode}
